abstract: NBCUniversal named Sanjay Macwan a senior vice president of its new Media Labs operation, part of the new NBCUniversal Technology Center.
snippet: NBCUniversal named Sanjay Macwan a senior vice president of its new Media Labs operation, part of the new NBCUniversal Technology Center.
lead_paragraph: Adam Arriola and Miranda Warren joined Scorch Agency, St. Louis. Mr. Arriola becomes creative director; he had been principal and associate creative director at Geile/Leon, Clayton, Mo. Ms. Warren becomes director for account services; she, too, came from Geile/Leon, where she had been principal and director for account services.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
